experience.title: Software Engineer
desc: Write adaptable, efficient, maintainable code. Implemented solutions to issues identified with api services and applications responsible for displaying data.

bio: Over the last 6+ years I've had the priviledge of working different areas of the development world; font-end and back-end development, product design, and project management.
